trans-unit.source: Used to represent the schema information for a Tool, a Custom Build Rule, a PropertyPage, and so on.
Typically represented on disk as XAML, only one instance of this class is maintained per XAML file per project engine (solution).

If you manually instantiate this class, call <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule.BeginInit%2A> before you set the first property of the object and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule.EndInit%2A> after you set the last property.
Default constructor.
Required for deserialization from a persisted format.

When this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule"></xref> represents a Build Customization, this field defines the semicolon-separated list of additional inputs to be evaluated for the Build Customization target.
This field is optional.
Returns a semicolon-separated list of additional inputs.
See <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.BeginInit"></xref>.

Gets or sets the list of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Category"></xref> categories that the properties in this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule"></xref> belong to.
This field is optional.
The field returns only the categories that were explicitly defined and that do not contain any auto-generated categories.

When a <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty> that is contained in this <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule> declares its category to be something that is not present in this list, then a <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Category> that has that name is auto-generated and added to the internal list of categories.
That auto-generated category is not returned by this field.
Returns the list of properties.

When this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule"></xref> represents a Build Customization, this field represents the command-line template to be used by a Build Customization task to invoke the tool.
This field is optional.
Returns the command-line template.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule.DataSource"></xref> for the properties in this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule"></xref>.
This is overridden by any data source that is defined locally for a property.
You do not have to specify this field if all individual properties have data sources defined locally.
Returns the data source.
Gets or sets a description of this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule"></xref> for use by a prospective UI client.
This field is optional and is culture-sensitive.
Returns the description.
Gets or sets a name that can be used by a prospective UI client to display this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty"></xref>.
This field is optional and is culture-sensitive.
When this property is not set, it is assigned the same value as the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule.Name%2A> property (and, therefore, would not be localized).
Returns the name.
See <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.EndInit"></xref>.

Returns the union of XAML specified <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Category"></xref> categories and auto-generated <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Category"></xref> categories.
The latter are created from any missing categories that are referred to by the properties in this Rule.
The auto-generated <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Category"></xref> categories only have their names set.
Returns the union of categories.

When this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule"></xref> represents a Build Customization, this field represents the message to be displayed before a Build Customization is executed during the build.
This field is optional.
Returns the message.
When this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule"></xref> represents a Build Customization, this field represents the file name extension to associate.
This field is optional.
Returns the file name extension.
Returns a dictionary of all properties partitioned into categories.
The returned list may contain auto-generated categories.
If a <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty> (or its derived classes) refer to a property that is not specified, then an new Category is generated for it.
If no category is specified for the property, then the property is put in the "General" category.
The list of categories is exactly as specified in the XAML file.
The auto-generated categories come after the specified categories but in no strict order.
Returns a dictionary whose keys are the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Category"></xref> names and whose values are the list of properties in that category.
The returned value is never `null`.
Returns the list of properties in a <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Category"></xref>.
The name of the category whose properties are to be returned.
Returns the list of properties in a <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Category"></xref>.
Returns `null` if this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule"></xref> does not contain this category.
Gets the property with the specified name.
The name of the property.
Returns the property with the specified name, or null if no property with a matching name is found.
Returns an enumerator over all instances of static data that have the given type.
The type of static data to retrieve.
Returns an enumerator over all instances of static data that have the given type.
Returns `Null` or Empty list if no objects of the given type are provided by this node.
Returns an enumerator over all types of static data for the data-driven features that this node contains.
Returns an enumerator over all types of static data for the data-driven features that this node contains.
Gets or sets Help information for this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule"></xref>.
Can be used to specify a Help URL.
This field is optional and is culture-sensitive.
Returns the Help information.
Gets or sets arbitrary metadata that may be set on a rule.
Returns <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2"></xref>.
The name of this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule"></xref>.
This field is mandatory and culture-invariant.
The value of this field cannot be set to the empty string.
Returns the name.
Gets or sets a suggestion to a prospective UI client for the relative location of this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule"></xref> compared to all other Rules in the system.
Returns the suggestion.

When this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule"></xref> represents a Build Customization, this field defines the semicolon-separated list of outputs that are to be evaluated for the Build Customization target.
This field is optional.
Returns the outputs.
Gets or sets the method to use when multiple rules with the same name appear in the project to reconcile the rules into one instance.
Returns <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.RuleOverrideMode"></xref>.
Gets or sets the UI rendering template that is used to display this Rule.
The value used to set this field can be anything as long as it is recognized by the intended rendering template.
This field is required only if this Rule is meant to be displayed as a property page.
Returns the UI template.
Gets or sets the list of properties in this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule"></xref>.
At least one property must be specified.
The list returned by this property should not be modified.
Returns the list of properties.
Gets or sets a flag indicating whether property pages for this rule are hidden.
Returns flag value.
Gets or sets a token that is used to separate a property switch from its value.

The value specified here is overridden by the value specified by the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty.Separator%2A> of the child <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty>.
This field is optional and culture-invariant.
Returns the token separator.
Gets or sets a flag that determines whether to hide the command-line category.
This field is optional.
The default value is `true`.
Returns `true` if command-line categories are hidden; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets a flag that determines whether multiple files can be batched on one command-line invocation.
This field is optional.
Returns `true` if multiple files can be batched; otherwise, `false`.

Gets or sets the prefix to use for all property switches in this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule"></xref> for the case when this property <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Rule"></xref> represents a tool.

The value specified can be overridden by the value specified by the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty.SwitchPrefix%2A> of a child <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty>.
This field is optional and culture-invariant.
Returns the prefix.
Gets or sets the name of the tool when this rule represents a tool.
Returns the name of the tool.
